verbose_text: 31 P magnetic resonance spectroscopy (31 P MRS) is often used to study energy metabolism in-vivo and non invasively,4, 5 for it can detect the energy metabolism products such as adenosine triphosphate (ATP), phosphocreatine (PCr), and inorganic phosphate (Pi).
evidence: energy metabolism products such as adenosine triphosphate (ATP), phosphocreatine
